data.text: @KaySaravo @Christi06128221 She also played Catwoman in The Lego Batman Movie
@KaySaravo At my school we are no longer required to wear masks but I still wear my masks
@Elf340 Also side note, there's more to the 1950a Batman music than the theme song but I am not downplaying it.
@Elf340 I JUST finished it i think the 60s Batman was better but I have an affinity for campiness
@KaySaravo They're pretty good scores and I thought the Schumacher films were enjoyable, but I understand.
@Elf340 I value my brain cells so I skipped it

@KaySaravo I think it was Neal Hefti who was in charge of na na na na na na na BATMAN!

But no, Elliot Goldenthal was the guy that did Batman Forever and Batman & Robin.
@Elf340 I’m unfamiliar with his work. Was he the guy in charge of the 60s Batman? He’s as awesome as Danny
@KaySaravo I'm curious. What are your thoughts on Elliot Goldenthal's Batman score?
@Elf340 Agreed Danny made the theme for the Animated Series too but I didn’t watch the Michael Keaton Batman movies as much as the Christian Bale
